text: when it was made retroactive, meaning soldiers from World War I could be honored.
speaker: SPEAKER_07

text: The first such medal was given to General Douglas MacArthur.
speaker: SPEAKER_07

text: In 1942, Congress changed the parameters for the Purple Heart, making it awardable only for injuries or wounds suffered in service.
speaker: SPEAKER_07

text: and expanded it to all the military branches.
speaker: SPEAKER_07

text: Originally, it was restricted to just Army soldiers.
speaker: SPEAKER_07

text: Purple symbolizes the courage of those who serve.
speaker: SPEAKER_07

text: The modern metal features a bust of Washington on one side and the words for military merit on the other.
speaker: SPEAKER_07

speaker: SPEAKER_10

text: When your vision is at risk from retinal disease, you need the expertise of a retina specialist.
speaker: SPEAKER_10

text: Retina specialists are highly trained physicians and surgeons who treat retinal conditions in adults and children, as well as severe eye trauma.
speaker: SPEAKER_10

text: If you experience blurred central vision, a curtain-like shadow in your vision, floaters, flashing lights or wavy lines, see a retina specialist as soon as possible.

text: Today, people with disabilities can achieve a better life experience with AbleNow, a tax-advantaged savings account specifically designed for people with disabilities with unique advantages for Virginians.

text: AbleNow accounts help eligible individuals save and invest their own money without endangering certain disability benefits.

text: There is no enrollment fee, no minimum amount required to start your savings, and anyone can contribute to make dreams a reality.
